text: granthadavaralli heccinavaru, nīvu viśvāsigaḷāda baḷika nim'mannu matte dhikkāradeḍege maraḷisabayasiddaru. Satyavu avarige spaṣṭavāda baḷikavū avaru tam'moḷagina asūyeyindāgi (hīge māḍuttiddāre). Nīvu mātra, ī kuritu allāhanu tanna ādēśavannu prakaṭisuva tanakavū (avarannu) kṣamisuttalū (avara tappannu) kaḍegaṇisuttalū iri. Allāhanu khaṇḍita ellavannu māḍaballavanāgiddāne
